data.quote: What is a glasses man?
What is right... what is wrong... you can't easily tell the difference. That's why you must keep thinking, whether what you are doing is right or not. That act itself, alone, can be called right.
To kill the one you love... If someone else will do it anyway, I'd rather do it myself.
Old, young, man, woman,  a life is a life. Sinner or Saint it makes no difference at all.
Honest feelings can sometimes lead to cruel endings.

(referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to 'like yourself\'. But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.
My motivation might seem trivial compared to yours, but I can’t lose, either. I have to live up to the hopes of those who supported me.

In a real fight, there is no next time. You can't choose your opponent's strength. Losing would mean death. If a duty-bound person dies, a hundred more innocent people would die. We exorcists cannot die easily, and that is a responsibility.

Regardless of our limitations, we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes, because if an opening arises, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!
I'm an apple for a day and I need a doctor right away...
Believe it!
I am Justice!
It's over 9000!
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
The only way to deal with the past... is to put it in a strong metal box, or it will eat you alive.
I don't want to be a hero. I want to be a very, very bad man!
No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see the end of this world, and to see why it was born. Live to see why a weak girl like me ended up here... And the reason you and I met.
In this world, evil can arise from the best of intentions. And there is good which can come from evil intentions.
There is no such thing as coincidence in this world. There is only necessity.
People die if they are killed.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
Don't beg for it. Earn it. Then it will be granted to you.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. For you cannot gain something without sacrificing something else in return.
I'm not gonna stop the wheel. I'm going to break the wheel.
Sometimes people are just mean. Don't fight mean with mean. Hold your head high.
You have no idea how this world works, and that's why you're the one to change it.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
If you've got time to fantasize about a beautiful death, why not live beautifully until the end.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
I don't want the world to see me because I don't think that they'd understand.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
I have nothing to say to you, except... goodbye.
Nobody knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
The bond between Nezuko and me can't be severed by anyone!
When you have to save someone, they're usually in a scary situation. Just look at them... Reach out... And say something kind!
No regrets. If you trust, you will be betrayed anyway.
I can't stand people who don't appreciate life.
I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to!
I want to be a person who lives for others.
I am searching for you. Whoever you are, where are you?
Science is the power of humans.

data.anime: The Rising of the Shield Hero
data.quote: I may not look like a hero, but I have to try!
Weaklings can't pick their way of death.
People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.
I want to prove that I'm not a failure.
I don't want to conquer anything. It's just that the person with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!
Eren, I'll find you. I promise.
I'm not gonna be your worthless punching bag Deku forever.
I'd rather trust and regret than doubt and regret.
The bond between people is more crucial than the power between people.
I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.
I mustn't run away. I mustn't run away.
I'm Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil.
I love the kind of woman that can kick my ass.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
Don't believe in yourself. Believe in me! Believe in the Kamina who believes in you!
I am not going to die. My nakama are going to protect me.
Your next line will be... 'This is an awesome quote!'
Whatever happens, happens.
If you want to stand on the same stage as the person you admire, you have to work hard.
Death is the only truth. You are mistaken if you think that any other truth exists.
I don't want to survive. I want to live.
Every step you take is forever. You can't take it back.
I want to see and understand the world outside. I don't want to die inside these walls without knowing what's out there.
I want to know what 'I love you' means.
We will be eaten if we just sit and wait. So I'm going to escape.
You can't defeat a demon by focusing on saving someone. Don't let your emotions take over.
I have to go beyond, even if it's just a little bit.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
